content: newborn hockey skate booties worsted yarn white black and gray and an f 3 75 hook fyi i am a very tight crocheter the sole of the bootie should measure approximately 3 5 see figure 1 2 sole using white working continuously in the round 1 chain 9 work 2 single_crochet in the chain from hook single_crochet in the next 3 chain half_double_crochet in the next chain double_crochet in the next 2 chain 7 double_crochet in the last chain working around to the other side of the chain now working in the opposite chains double_crochet in the next 2 chain half_double_crochet in the next chain single_crochet in the next 3 chain single_crochet in the last chain same chain as the first 2sc 22 sts figure 1 1 2 2sc 2 single_crochet 7 2sc 5 single_crochet 7 2sc 30 sts 3 *single_crochet 2sc* x2 single_crochet 7 *single_crochet 2sc* x5 single_crochet 8 2 single_crochet 38 sts 4 single_crochet in each st 38 sts 5 slip_stitch in each st 38 sts f/o figure 1 3 body now using black and working in joined rounds starting in the same space as the ch1 1 attach black yarn 6 sts to the right from the back center st figure 1 4 single_crochet in each st around 38 sts join with a slip_stitch and ch1 2 single_crochet in each st around 38 sts join with a slip_stitch and ch1 3 single_crochet in each st around 38 sts join with a slip_stitch and ch1 4 single_crochet in each st around 38 sts join with a slip_stitch and ch1 5 single_crochet 18 decrease hdc2tog x4 decrease sc8 32 sts join with a slip_stitch and ch1 6 single_crochet 18 decrease x3 single_crochet 8 29 sts join with a slip_stitch and ch1 7 single_crochet 17 decrease x3 sc6 20 sts join with a slip_stitch and f/o *it is easier to weave your end in now than to go back and do it after finishing* sides still using black yarn but you will be working in row instead of in the round 1 2 sts in from the last decrease see figure 2 1 attach black yarn and single_crochet 22 22sts ch1 and turn 2 single_crochet 22 22sts ch1 and turn 3 decrease single_crochet 18 decrease 20sts ch1 and turn 4 single_crochet 20 20sts ch1 and turn 5 decrease single_crochet 16 decrease 18sts ch1 and turn 6 single_crochet 18 18sts ch1 and turn 7 single_crochet 18 single_crochet again in the last st then continue to single_crochet around the entire front edge and join with a slip_stitch to the first st of the round f/o figures 2 2 and 2 3 tongue using black yarn again and in row 1 this round is worked in blo see figure 2 4 single_crochet in each of the 4 front center sts 4sts ch1 and turn 2 now working in both loops- single_crochet 4 4sts ch1 and turn 3 2sc single_crochet 2 2sc 6sts ch1 and turn 4 single_crochet 6 6sts ch1 and turn 5
